text: Frederick Schmidt is a British actor, he has appeared in such films Mission: Impossible – Fallout (2018) and Angel Has Fallen (2019). ==Career== In his early career, he stars in many British films. In Mission: Impossible – Fallout (2018), he appears alongside Tom Cruise. In Angel Has Fallen (2019), he plays Wade Jennings's assistant. He also stars in the TV series Supergirl, in which he plays Metallo. ==Filmography== ===Film=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Year ! Title ! Role !
